html: A vision—A vision or prophecy, containing dreadful calamities which were to fall upon Babylon. The spoiler—The Medes and Persians used treachery as well as force against Babylon. Elam—Persia, so called, because Elam was an eminent province of Persia, bordering upon the Medes. Besiege—Namely, Babylon, . The sighing—The sighing and groaning of God's people, and other nations under the oppressions of that cruel empire.
